english.segment1: You are good. And your love endures
english.segment2: You are good. And your love endures
english.segment3: You are good. And your love endures. Today
english.segment4: Lord let your glory fall. As on that ancient day. Songs of enduring love. And in your glory came
english.segment5: And as a sign to you. That we would love the same. Our hearts will sing that song. Lord let your glory come
english.segment6: (Chorus). You are good. You are good. And your love endures
english.segment7: You are good. You are good. And your love endures
english.segment8: You are good. You are good. And your love endures. Today
english.segment9: Voices in unison. Giving you thanks and praise. Join mighty instruments. And in your glory came
english.segment10: Your presence like a cloud. Upon that ancient day. The priests were overwhelmed. Because your glory came
english.segment12: A sacrifice was made. And then your fire came. They knelt upon the ground. And with one voice they prayed
